argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | kqval.2 | |- F = ( x e. X |-> { y e. J | x e. y } ) |
| 2 |  | #P_imassrn | |- ( F " U ) C_ ran F |
| 3 | 2 | #P_a1i | |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ U e. J ) -> ( F " U ) C_ ran F ) |
| 4 | 1 | #P_kqsat | |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ U e. J ) -> ( `' F " ( F " U ) ) = U ) |
| 5 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ U e. J ) -> U e. J ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ U e. J ) -> ( `' F " ( F " U ) ) e. J ) |
| 7 | 1 | #P_kqffn | |- ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) -> F Fn X ) |
| 8 |  | #P_dffn4 | |- ( F Fn X <-> F : X -onto-> ran F ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_sylib | |- ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) -> F : X -onto-> ran F ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ U e. J ) -> F : X -onto-> ran F ) |
| 11 |  | #P_elqtop3 | |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ F : X -onto-> ran F ) -> ( ( F " U ) e. ( J qTop F ) <-> ( ( F " U ) C_ ran F /\ ( `' F " ( F " U ) ) e. J ) ) ) |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_syldan | |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ U e. J ) -> ( ( F " U ) e. ( J qTop F ) <-> ( ( F " U ) C_ ran F /\ ( `' F " ( F " U ) ) e. J ) ) ) |
| 13 | 3, 6, 12 | #P_mpbir2and | |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ U e. J ) -> ( F " U ) e. ( J qTop F ) ) |
| 14 | 1 | #P_kqval | |- ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) -> ( KQ ` J ) = ( J qTop F ) ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ U e. J ) -> ( KQ ` J ) = ( J qTop F ) ) |
| 16 | 13, 15 | #P_eleqtrrd | |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ U e. J ) -> ( F " U ) e. ( KQ ` J ) ) |
